mapper.select: select count(*) cnt from recruit_view where uid = #{loginId}

select ${recruitColumn}, DATE_FORMAT(rv.view_date, '%m/%d') view_date from netfu_item_company nic, recruit_view rv where 1=1 and rv.uid = #{loginId} and rv.view_type = 'recruit' and nic.no = rv.to_no order by rv.view_date desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select ${resumeColumn}, DATE_FORMAT(rv.view_date, '%m/%d') view_date from netfu_item_resume nir, recruit_view rv where 1=1 and rv.uid = #{loginId} and rv.view_type = 'resume' and nir.no = rv.to_no order by rv.view_date desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}
